Name: Metrail
About the game: Metrail is a simple, music driven experience. It contains three levels, each having 'chords' and 'notes' following the track. The notes are one-shots, while chords require the correct keys to be held down to pass through.
Meta Title: Metrail: Nov 2, 2019, Oddscure and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Metrail? Check out the release date (Nov 2, 2019), developer insights from Oddscure, and a complete game summary.
